com.brakassey.sunproject

Class Animator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brakassey.sunproject.Animator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

    public class Animator
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
    This class allows to make moving animation with a sprites sheet.

      • Animator

        public Animator(java.lang.String spriteAnime,
        int FRAME_COLS,
        int FRAME_ROWS,
        float originX,
        float originY)
        The constructor:
        Parameters:
        spriteAnime - This is the sprites sheet path
        FRAME_COLS - The number of columns in the sprites sheet
        FRAME_ROWS - The number of rows in the sprites sheet
        originX - The animation origin at X coordinate
        originY - The animation origin at Y coordinate
